TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XpsSerializationPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel printTicketLevel, int32 sequence) cil managed

Docs.param: An object that specifies the scope of the <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket">.
Either the total number of pages or the number of documents in the print job. Which applies depends on the scope of the <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket">.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs"> class.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket"> that is used in the writing operation.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket"> that defines how the printer handles a print job.

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates the scope of the <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket">.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel"> value that indicates the scope of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>.

Docs.summary: Gets either the total number of pages or the number of documents in the print job.
Docs.value: An <see cref="T:System.Int32"> that represents the total number of pages or the number of documents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Whether this property represents pages or documents depends on the scope (for example, single document or multiple documents) of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>.
